translation.en: [narrator] Just east of North Westville and south of Goo-bai,
translation.ko: 노스 웨스트빌의 동쪽이자 구바이의 남쪽에 있는

translation.en: a town known as Glurfsburg might catch your eye.
It begins with a kite, and then...
[narrator] That is a... That's a ninja!
This is Dr. Seuss, so I wasn't expecting--
Oh, why would you cut the line?
What's a piece of paper gonna do?
Oh, you just answered my question.
[narrator] This sneak has snuck into a zoo!
[narrator] That wall is no problem. It's barely a hurdle!
translation.ko: 높은 벽을 허들 넘듯이 쉽게 넘어버리네요!

translation.en: But the same can't be said of those large slapping turtles!
translation.ko: 하지만 커다란 찰싹 거북이는 만만치 않은데요!

translation.en: Okay, okay. Shh, shh, shh, shh. Easy. Easy, now.
[narrator] Yet, when the guard got there, see what he learnt:
The cage was still present, but man and beast...
translation.ko: 우리는 그대로 남아 있지만 남자와 짐승은...

translation.en: On your left! Busy inventor coming through!
Well, I'm gonna be late! I'm going to be late!
[narrator] "Who's this guy," you wonder, "rushing round in a hurry?"
translation.ko: 바삐 걸어가는 이 남자가 누군지 궁금하시죠?
이제 곧 알게 될 테니 걱정하지 마세요
이제 곧 알게 될 테니 걱정하지 마세요 "일생일대의 미팅에 늦지 마세요!"

translation.en: They have the Yaps, but we're searching for a cure!
translation.ko: 야프스병을 앓고 있는데 저희가 치료제를 찾고 있어요!

translation.en: Stupid Yips and Yaps making me late!
translation.ko: 이프인지 야프인지 간에 이러다 늦겠네! "싫어요, 싫다고요"

translation.en: Would you mind taking a photo of us?
I'm Guy, life-long inventor, here for the biggest meeting of my life!
translation.ko: 가이라고 합니다 평생 발명가로 살았죠 일생일대의 미팅을 하러 왔어요!

translation.en: Have a seat. We'll be with you in the next seven hours.
[narrator] Look at the neat and amazing inventions!
Every one worthy of Snerz's attention!
And right over there is a narrator muter!
[voice fading] Wait! Hold on! No! Stop turning the dial, please! I can't--
-[people applauding] -Yours is a winner for sure!
All right! Woo-hoo! I'm going to Meepville!
[woman] Oh, I hope we make the cut!
Ooh! An auto finger-crosser? They said it couldn't be done!
translation.ko: 행운을 빌어주는 기계예요? 다들 못 만들 거랬는데!
특별할 게 없다고요? 거참 특별할 거 같네요!

translation.en: Get a load of that! Snerz is gonna love that!
translation.ko: 저것 좀 봐요! 스너즈 마음에 쏙 들겠어!

translation.en: [narrator] A narrator muter? These people have no idea what I do. This is my craft--
translation.ko: 해설자 조용히 장치라니? 저 사람들은 내 일이 얼마나...

translation.en: -Support the Yips, sir? -[narrator] Ah-ha! I'm back!
-Just in time to meet our other hero! -[whistling]
translation.ko: 마침 또 한 명의 영웅을 만나볼 시간이군요!

translation.en: Nice, try there, puddle. Not gonna catch me!
Just tragic. Okay, where do I sign? Can I do it more than once?
translation.ko: 비극이네요, 어디 서명할까요? 여러 번 해도 되나요?

translation.en: Here we go! Uh-oh! Coming through!
Oh, family photo! Priceless moment! Say cheese!
-Give me duck face! Tea pot arms! -[family laughs]
translation.ko: 입술 내밀기! 손목 꺾기! 다리 들기!

translation.en: Put a leg in the air! Pucker hard! Squat!
translation.ko: 입술 내밀기! 손목 꺾기! 다리 들기! 얼굴 구기기! 쪼그려 앉기! 소리 질러!
얼굴 구기기! 쪼그려 앉기! 소리 질러!

translation.en: I'm the only person in this room.
You sure there isn't anyone else you want to squeeze in first?
translation.ko: 저보다 먼저 들여보낼 다른 사람 없는 거 확실하죠?

translation.en: Nope. You're the absolute, very last person they wanted to see.
They're just a bunch of bean counters and pencil pushers.
translation.ko: 콩이나 세고 펜이나 놀리는 사람들일 뿐이니까

translation.en: [narrator] Our friend Guy-Am-I hasn't been a success.
translation.ko: 우리 친구 가이 엠 아이는 성공한 적이 없어요

translation.en: Every invention's ended up a huge mess.
All that failure has made his hope nearly run dry.
translation.ko: "심사위원" 매번 실패하다 보니 희망도 거의 다 사라졌답니다

translation.en: But today, he's gonna give it...
Trapped on a cold air balloon with a bunch of strangers,
translation.ko: 냉기구에서 옴짝달싹 못 하는데 사방의 낯선 사람들은

translation.en: pestering you, never letting you stew in peace.
translation.ko: 성가시게 하고 가만히 쉬질 못하게 하죠

translation.en: Stuck at the mercy of someone else's schedule as the last bus pulls away,
translation.ko: 다른 사람 일정에 맞춘 마지막 버스는 떠나버리고

translation.en: Well, what if you could go where you want to,
translation.ko: 가고 싶은 곳을 가고 싶은 시간에

translation.en: whenever you want to, entirely on your own?
translation.ko: 완전히 혼자서 갈 수 있다면 어떨까요?

translation.en: I was ignoring the sad man, but he has my attention now!
translation.ko: 저 우울한 사람 무시했는데 이제 흥미가 생기는걸!
배타적이고 야망이 있어 정말 스너즈가 좋아할 만해!

translation.en: Just what every child needs! A death trap strapped onto their back!
translation.ko: 애들이 참 좋아하겠어요! 저 위험한 걸 등에 메다니!

translation.en: as you will see in the following demonstration,

translation.ko: 이제 시연을 해 보일 텐데요 절대로 터지지 않을 겁니다

translation.en: Don't explode. Don't explode. Don't explode.
I think we're all in agreement.
Get ready to pitch to Snerz himself!
[narrator] Guy felt fantastic! He'd finally won!
translation.ko: 가이는 꿈만 같았죠! 마침내 성공한 거예요!

translation.en: He'd invented a thing-a-ma-do that had done!
Oh, dear. I'm not gonna say, "I told you so," because I've written it down.
translation.ko: 그럴 줄 알았단 말은 안 할게요 왜냐하면 미리 써뒀거든요

translation.en: [narrator] Guy wondered why he bothered to even show up...
translation.ko: 가이는 뭐 하러 여기까지 왔을까 싶었어요

translation.en: when everything he invented was sure to blow up.
There's Guy's critic, bean counter Michellee,
translation.ko: 가이를 쏘아붙인 건 콩 계량원 미셸리예요

translation.en: whose face always looked like she'd smelled something...
Oh, just the thought of that awful device gives me the fuzzles.
translation.ko: 저 끔찍한 장치는 생각만 해도 아찔하네요

translation.en: I wouldn't let my daughter go anywhere near it. [sighs]
translation.ko: 제 딸은 근처도 못 가게 할 거예요

translation.en: [narrator] E.B.'s not so fragile. If her mom only knew
translation.ko: 이비는 그리 연약하지 않아요 엄마가 모를 뿐이죠

translation.en: that she's luring a Pandog with cheese-stuffed bamboo.
translation.ko: 치즈를 채운 대나무로 팬독을 꼬시고 있네요

translation.en: [narrator] Mom would have a conniption. "No pets is the rule!"
translation.ko: 엄마는 크게 화를 낼 거예요 '애완동물은 안 돼!'

translation.en: As long as you buy me a car!

translation.ko: 안녕, 이비! 여덟 발 자전거 탈래?

translation.en: Because I don't have one. Because my mom won't let me.
translation.ko: 난 자전거도 없고 엄마가 못 타게 할 테니까

translation.en: Hey, why don't you hop on my handlebars then?
My mom would be able to tell.
She checks my eyebrows for wind-blownness
translation.ko: 엄마는 내 눈썹이 바람에 날렸는지 확인하고

translation.en: and my general disposition for any traces of exhilaration or whimsy.
translation.ko: 전반적으로 내가 들떴거나 엉뚱한 짓을 했는지 확인하시거든

translation.en: Yeah, you should just get out of here.
Just this conversation is slightly whimsilarating.
We interrupt this old person soap opera to report:
translation.ko: 어르신 드라마 보시는 중에 뉴스 속보입니다

translation.en: a Chickeraffe has escaped the Glurfsburg Zoo!
translation.ko: 글러프스버그 동물원에서 치커라프 한 마리가 탈출했습니다!

translation.en: This animal is wild and should be considered extremely dangerous!
translation.ko: "글러프스버그 동물원 생중계" 이 동물은 사나우며 몹시 위험하다고 봐야 합니다!

translation.en: Looks like I just found my new pet.
[man] Greetings, we have some questions about the Chickeraffe.
translation.ko: 이봐, 치커라프에 관해 물어볼 게 있는데

translation.en: [sighs] I already told you cops everything I know.
translation.ko: 제가 아는 건 경찰에 다 말씀드렸는데요

translation.en: Yeah, it's even on our card. Check it out!
Sweet font, huh? You have cards?
D-Don't hurt me! I-I-I'll tell you anything!
Better talk fast, 'cause this pole's getting really heavy!
translation.ko: 빨리 말하는 게 좋아요 낚싯대가 오래 못 버티니까!

translation.en: [whimpers] I-It just escaped! It ran away!
Please, McWinkle. Can I drop him, please?
If the man were a liar, his pants would be on fire.
translation.ko: 거짓말을 하는 거라면 눈빛에 드러나기 마련인데

translation.en: Those are clearly just scaredy pants.
Tell me, coward, did you find anything unusual at the scene?
translation.ko: 말해봐, 겁 많은 양반 현장에 특이한 점은 없었나?

translation.en: Just a kite, a snorkel, and a pole vault pole.
[McWinkle] I meant let him go... free.
How many jobs have I done, Gluntz?
And how many jobs have you done?
Roof slide! One, sir! Uh, counting this one.
translation.ko: 지붕 미끄러지기! 한 건입니다, 이번 일로요

translation.en: And may I just say, it has been sick!
This was no escape. Someone broke in and took that Chickeraffe.
translation.ko: 탈출한 게 아니야 누가 숨어들어서 훔쳐 간 거다

translation.en: That someone has the animal. He is our target.
translation.ko: 치커라프를 데리고 있는 그놈이 우리 표적이야

translation.en: Can you see me? I am jacked right now!
[exclaims] I have always wanted a target!
We find the target, we find the Chickeraffe
and deliver it directly to the Bigman.
[narrator] In Meepville, there was no man bigger than Snerz,
translation.ko: 미프빌에서 그분이라고 하면 대개 스너즈를 뜻했죠

translation.en: whose hair was, in fact, just a miniature Flerz.
Tell me, Yes Man, is it ready?
[narrator] He owned everything that a Snerson could own!
translation.ko: 스너즈인이 가질 수 있는 모든 걸 가졌어요!

translation.en: Like a solid gold stapler and a gold-plated stone.
translation.ko: 순금 종이찍개나 도금한 돌 같은 것들요

translation.en: [narrator] But his pets were his most belovedest treasures.
Animal friends who'd be with him...
translation.ko: 동물 친구들은 그의 곁에 있을 테죠

translation.en: [narrator] Just one spot remained on Snerz's wall,
and it was reserved for the rarest of all.
translation.ko: 가장 희귀한 동물을 위해 남겨져 있었죠

translation.en: [narrator] Guy has inventions but no place called home.
translation.ko: 가이에게는 발명품은 있어도 집이라 할 곳은 없어요

translation.en: And right now, he's desperate to take off and roam.
translation.ko: 이제 자포자기한 가이는 정처 없이 떠돌려고 합니다

translation.en: Where does it matter, be it far or near?
translation.ko: 멀든 가깝든 간에 그게 무슨 상관이겠어요?

translation.en: [announcer over PA] The 4:28 bus to AnyOldWhereButHere is departing in three seconds.
translation.ko: '여기만 아니면 어디든' 가는 4시 28분 버스 3초 후 출발합니다

translation.en: [announcer] That's it. That was three seconds.

translation.ko: 안 돼! 나 좀 태워줘요, 제발!

translation.en: Stupid bus! Stupid town! Stupid sidewalk!
translation.ko: 멍청한 버스! 멍청한 동네! 멍청한 길 같으니!

translation.en: -Apps are over here. -I'll have the oatmush.
-No. -How about a touch of honey, honey?
Just oatmush, dry, and a spoon.
translation.ko: 아무것도 안 뿌린 귀리죽에 숟가락이나 주세요

translation.en: [cook] One Sad Man's Special comin' up!
[narrator] What to do next? Certainly not invent.
translation.ko: 이제 뭘 할까요? 발명은 아니겠지만 "실패자들을 위한 일자리"

translation.en: [narrator] But Guy needed something to help pay the rent.
Love what you've done with your fur!
[Donna] Oh, you! Same as it always is.
It's like finding a matching snowflake.
It's an unremarkable attache sold in most major stores.
translation.ko: 웬만한 가게에 다 파는 평범한 외교관 가방인데요

translation.en: Plus, to end up sitting next to each other like this.

translation.ko: 샘 아이 엠이죠 글러프스버그의 아이 엠 가족

translation.en: Lovely name. How do you spell that?
Is that one rumph or two?
So, Sam, I imagine you'll be having the ushe?
[gasps] You don't like green eggs and ham?
No, I do not like them, Sam-I-Am.
translation.ko: 네, 안 좋아해요, 샘 아이 엠

translation.en: I do not like green eggs and ham.
translation.ko: 저는 초록 달걀과 햄 안 좋아해요

translation.en: Have you ever tried them before?
Well, how can you be so sure you don't like 'em if you've never actually eaten 'em?
translation.ko: 먹어본 적도 없으면서 안 좋아하는지 어떻게 알죠?

translation.en: Well, I've never eaten Walvark droppings, but I'm certain I wouldn't enjoy those either.
translation.ko: 월바크 똥을 안 좋아하는지 꼭 먹어봐야 압니까?

translation.en: But green eggs and ham are the most deliciousist, nutritiousist,
translation.ko: 하지만 초록 달걀과 햄은 가장 맛있고 영양이 풍부하고

translation.en: And PS, they're especially good here.
translation.ko: 그리고 여기서 먹는 게 특히 맛있어요

translation.en: That's fantastic. But I don't want them, here or otherwise.
translation.ko: 잘됐지만, 난 먹고 싶지 않아요 여기서든 다른 데서든

translation.en: Tell you what, make that two orders, Donna. On me.
translation.ko: 하나 더 주세요, 도나 제가 살게요

translation.en: No! Just oatmush! And a spoon!
[growls] Would you please just leave me alone? -[bell dings] -[cook] Order up!
Oh, boy! Oh, boy! Oh, boy! It's coming!
Bring them in for a landing! The hangar is open!

translation.ko: - 늘 먹던 거요, 맛있게 드세요 - 좋아요!

translation.en: Excuse me, but I ordered mine first.
Food comes out when it's ready.
Oh, that's a good nose. It's an eggy nose.
I'm getting hints of egg, and yes, definitely green.
translation.ko: 이래야 달걀 요리지 좋아, 초록색도 진하고

translation.en: It's like eating little pieces of joy.
What do you recommend for a celebration? Because...
-Drop the flavor hammer, Bert! -[cook] You got it!
Can't wait to try them in Meepville!
translation.ko: 미프빌에 갈 때까지 참을 수가 없네!

translation.en: Hey, Donna, sorry to be a nudge,
but my Briefcase Buddy here is still waiting on an oatmush.
translation.ko: 여행 가방 친구가 시킨 귀리죽이 아직도 안 나왔는데요

translation.en: -Spoon on the side? -You got it, sport.
That's what best friends are for!
-I just met you. -[bell dings] [Bert] Order up!
Now, to test it on our first live subject,
Well, thank you, Mrs. McGrisses. Yeah.
Oh, uh... [clears throat] Good evening, Mother!
Oh! There's the bean that counts most of all.

translation.ko: 엉뚱한 짓을 좀 한 것 같은데?

translation.en: So, who's excited about our big business trip?
translation.ko: 우리 출장 가는 거 기대되지 않니?

translation.en: But... counter-proposal, maybe I could just stay here.
translation.ko: 근데 저는 그냥 집에 있을까 봐요

translation.en: But I thought you were looking forward to seeing Meepville.
translation.ko: 미프빌 구경하는 거 기대하는 줄 알았는데?

translation.en: You know, I'm just worried about the big city,
where every step is a roll of the dice.
Maybe I'd be safer here in boring Glurfsburg where nothing ever happens.
translation.ko: 아무 일도 없는 따분한 글러프스버그가 안전할지도 모르죠

translation.en: [man on TV] Something happens in Glurfsburg!
If there are children or over-protective single mothers in the room,
-you may want to ask them to leave. -Oh, my!
Do not panic! Chickeraffes are incredibly scary!
They have huge teeth, sharp claws, a beak that can snap a man in two...
translation.ko: 이빨은 크고, 발톱은 날카롭고 부리는 사람을 반으로...

translation.en: I've-- I've seen this one before.
Spoiler alert: It's all made up and not worth paying attention to.
translation.ko: 사실 다 지어낸 거예요 관심 가질 필요 없어요

translation.en: Stare at one too long, and it'll steal your soul!
translation.ko: 너무 오래 쳐다봤다가는 영혼을 빼앗길 겁니다!

translation.en: Was that a Chickeraffe? Run for your lives!
Oh! Oh, my! Right here in Glurfsburg?
E.B., this creature is not a pet.
Chickeraffes walk on two feet, Mom.
So they can use the other two to mash their prey into a fine paste.
translation.ko: 그래야 나머지 두 발로 먹잇감을 짓이겨버릴 테니까

translation.en: You are definitely coming with me to Meepville, young lady.
translation.ko: 넌 무조건 엄마랑 같이 미프빌에 가는 거야

translation.en: And yes, the big city can be dangerous.
translation.ko: 그래, 큰 도시는 위험할 수도 있지

translation.en: Which is why we have these!
This way, we can stick together and be safe always, like friends.
translation.ko: 이거면 계속 안전하게 친구처럼 붙어 있을 수 있어

translation.en: [narrator] The time hadcome to choose a choice.
But stuff blowing up is a valid complaint.
Could it be time to start watching paint?
You may say those leftovers are for the Pandog,
but we all know they're for you.
It's getting late. I should probably be heading home anyway.
translation.ko: 어차피 시간이 늦어서 집에 가야 할 것 같아요

translation.en: Got a bunch of friends there waiting for me.
I should give you my address in case you and the kitchen staff feel like coming by.
translation.ko: 도나랑 주방 직원들도 오고 싶으면 내 주소를 알려줄게요

translation.en: From the last time you invited us?
And the six times before that.

translation.ko: 여기는 17번 경관 전 대원에게 다시 알린다
여기는 17번 경관 전 대원에게 다시 알린다 치커라프는 몹시 위험하다!

translation.en: -[grunts] -[cop 1] Did you see that? [cop 2] Uh, yeah, I think it went down that alley.
translation.ko: - 봤어? - 응, 골목으로 간 거 같아

translation.en: [cop 1 gasps] Was that it? Check it out!
[people in pool] We're going to Meepville!
♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪ ♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪
[people in pool] Those are just curtains!
[people in pool singing] ♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville... ♪
[narrator] Guy picked the briefcase! He'll fix his Self-Flyer!
translation.ko: 가이는 가방을 집었어요! 1인 비행 장치를 고치려고요!

translation.en: My bad. He's tossing it into that fire.
